## 9) Duplication & Drift
- Duplicate component names:
  - GET declared in multiple files (src/app/api/admin/products/route.ts, src/app/api/concierge/envcheck/route.ts, src/app/api/concierge/products/route.ts, src/app/api/creators/apply/route.ts, src/app/api/dashboard/analytics/concierge/route.ts, src/app/api/dashboard/support/csat/route.ts, src/app/api/dashboard/support/tickets/route.ts, src/app/api/dev-analytics/collect/route.ts, src/app/api/health/route.ts, src/app/api/metrics/route.ts, src/app/api/neon/cart/[cartId]/route.ts, src/app/api/neon/catalog/route.ts, src/app/api/neon/catalog/[slug]/route.ts, src/app/api/neon/customizer/config/route.ts)
  - PATCH declared in multiple files (src/app/api/admin/products/[sku]/route.ts, src/app/api/neon/cart/[cartId]/route.ts)
  - POST declared in multiple files (src/app/api/admin/products/bulk-update/route.ts, src/app/api/ai/deepseek/chat/route.ts, src/app/api/creators/apply/route.ts, src/app/api/dev-analytics/collect/route.ts, src/app/api/guardrails/returns/route.ts, src/app/api/neon/cart/route.ts, src/app/api/neon/cart/[cartId]/route.ts, src/app/api/neon/checkout/route.ts, src/app/api/support/csat/route.ts, src/app/api/support/order-status/route.ts, src/app/api/support/order-updates/route.ts, src/app/api/support/products/route.ts, src/app/api/support/returns/route.ts, src/app/api/support/shortlist/route.ts, src/app/api/support/stylist/route.ts)
- High diversity of Tailwind classes (top 40 listed in Section 6).

## 10) Risk Register & Recommendations
| Risk | Files/Components | Impact | Effort | Recommended Fix |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Missing aria roles on interactive components | src/components/ui/Header.tsx:24; src/components/cart/CartIndicator.tsx:13; src/app/dashboard/catalog/[id]/page.tsx:81; src/app/dashboard/homepage/page.tsx:62 | high | medium | Add aria-label/role semantics to button/dialog primitives before release. |
| Unused exported components | src/components/ui/Card.tsx#CardHeader; src/components/ui/Card.tsx#CardContent; src/components/ui/Card.tsx#CardFooter; src/components/ui/Header.tsx#Header; src/components/ui/Footer.tsx#Footer; src/lib/concierge/types.ts#QUICK_LINKS; src/components/support/modules/ModuleRenderer.tsx#ModuleRenderer; src/components/homepage/HeroSection.tsx#HeroSection; src/lib/cartSession.ts#CART_COOKIE_NAME; src/app/dashboard/products/ProductTable.tsx#ProductTable | medium | low | Archive or remove dead components to reduce bundle size. |
| Duplicated component names across directories | GET declared in multiple files (src/app/api/admin/products/route.ts, src/app/api/concierge/envcheck/route.ts, src/app/api/concierge/products/route.ts, src/app/api/creators/apply/route.ts, src/app/api/dashboard/analytics/concierge/route.ts, src/app/api/dashboard/support/csat/route.ts, src/app/api/dashboard/support/tickets/route.ts, src/app/api/dev-analytics/collect/route.ts, src/app/api/health/route.ts, src/app/api/metrics/route.ts, src/app/api/neon/cart/[cartId]/route.ts, src/app/api/neon/catalog/route.ts, src/app/api/neon/catalog/[slug]/route.ts, src/app/api/neon/customizer/config/route.ts); PATCH declared in multiple files (src/app/api/admin/products/[sku]/route.ts, src/app/api/neon/cart/[cartId]/route.ts); POST declared in multiple files (src/app/api/admin/products/bulk-update/route.ts, src/app/api/ai/deepseek/chat/route.ts, src/app/api/creators/apply/route.ts, src/app/api/dev-analytics/collect/route.ts, src/app/api/guardrails/returns/route.ts, src/app/api/neon/cart/route.ts, src/app/api/neon/cart/[cartId]/route.ts, src/app/api/neon/checkout/route.ts, src/app/api/support/csat/route.ts, src/app/api/support/order-status/route.ts, src/app/api/support/order-updates/route.ts, src/app/api/support/products/route.ts, src/app/api/support/returns/route.ts, src/app/api/support/shortlist/route.ts, src/app/api/support/stylist/route.ts) | medium | medium | Create shared primitives or consolidate naming conventions. |
| Tailwind class sprawl | Multiple components | medium | medium | Consider extracting high-usage utility classes into tokens. |
